title: Ticket #2174: garbage job id in ALIVE debug message
description:
Claim::dprintf() did not have gcc printf format checking turned on and there were several instances of mismatch between format specifiers and arguments in the ALIVE protocol code.

The message where I noticed the problem was this one: 

slot1: Response problem from schedd on ALIVE job 102356560.2637375.

The job id is garbage.
check_ins: 2011-May-18 18:44   Check-in [21905]: Fixed bad dprintf format arguments in startd ALIVE protocol. ===GT=== #2174 ===VersionHistory=== Communication errors during claim lease renewal were reported with the wrong job id in the startd log file. (By Dan Bradley )
creator: danb
